Name: Pink Americano
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Pink Grapefruit soda
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist.
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
History: Created in 2015 by George Tsirikos, Athens, Greece.
Nutrition: One serving of Pink Americano contains 117 calories
